title: Is the Ogden Water Treatment Plant still on schedule for September.  How will I know when I\'m getting \'softer\' water?
text:
Yes, we're told the treatment plant is still scheduled for
mid-September, and the StarNews will likely do an article once it's
done. You should be able to taste the difference as we've reported
here:
